issue.title: [CF 1113] Arena1/2/3 Auras Showing Wrong
issue.body:
7.2.6-17-gf51c947

http://puu.sh/hsqI3/7cbf217117.jpg

Something to do w/the newest version, as this bug wasn't here any previous version. Once combat is entered (or maybe someone uses a spell that is tracked) all arena1/2/3 update to the properly tracked auras. At least sometimes, at least.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1113 | Raw

comments.body:
Pretty sure this has something to do with Arena3 auras.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Does it happen all the time?

When it does happen, does it always display things for arena3's class?

This one is much stranger than the last bug...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I don't wanna say ALL the time, but more often than not. I didn't play much last night so I'll get more info as I play.

So far it's always replicated the Arena3 auras to A1/2.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Fixed in g924b447. Was happening due to arena enemy names coming back as "Unknown" for a brief moment, and TMW not listening to events that notify when the actual name becomes available.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
